title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: The label font size does not change immediately after it is modified in the UI.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the settings page.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
OB: The label height does not change immediately after modifying the label font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly after modifying the label font size in the UI.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the settings page.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
